title: Dancing With the Stars' Tom Bergeron to Miss Monday Night's Show
text:
Dancing With the Stars' Tom Bergeron to Miss Monday Night's Show 
Published By: TVLine.com - Today 
Dancing With the Stars will be without one of its hosts this week. Tom Bergeron announced via Twitter on Sunday that he will be absent from ...
